DEPTH = 256; -- The size of memory in words 
WIDTH = 8; -- The size of data in bits 
ADDRESS_RADIX = DEC; -- The radix for address values 
DATA_RADIX = BIN; -- The radix for data values 
CONTENT -- start of (address : data pairs) 

BEGIN
0:01000011;
1:00101000;
2:00110000;
3:00111100;
252: 10010000; --11111000 01111000 10010001 00100001 00000111 10000010 10000111 11111000 11111010 11111110 
253: 00001111; --00101110 10010010 00001010 00001110 00000001 10010001 00001000 01111000 01111000 01101110 11111110
254: 01111000;
255: 10000000;
END
